description:
Robert Hardy is the United States Democratic Party`s presidential candidate.
He becomes the target of the underworld driving his campaign with a slogan, "No to drugs".
It is later reveled that he is in fact the father of http://anidb.net/ch17049 [Sonia], a.k.a. Joanna Hardy, who now plots to assasinate him in order to revenge the death of her mother.
name: Robert Hardy
